title: Gmail on FIrefox
content:
Thank you for your help. Whenever I try to login to my gmail account from FireFox I am blocked and get the email: "Someone just used your password to try to sign in to your account. Google blocked them, but you should check what happened." It's very frustrating because it forces me to use chromeÂ :( Any advice would be highly appreciated.

Details: Win10, I use privacy badger and Ublock Origin but I tried turning them off at no avail.
creator: feldermaus

title: Picture in picture does not work
content: I have a streaming video which does not provide the option to place the video in picture in picture. Is there a type of video that plays in FF but that doesn't work in picture in picture option?
creator: mace2

title: download stops
content: im trying to install a 25 gb file zip and when it gets to 5,7 gb it stops now i've done a research and every one says about:config so when i go to see this i get pages not error, pages so i din't understand how to make it appear please help me
creator: anappi347

title: Firefox having issues
content: Over time Firefox gets worse and worse with various websites. I reset it and it's fine for a while, but then it gets worse again. Links won't work, things don't open, etc. when they will with Safari. I don't like Safari and I'd rather keep using Firefox, but not if it's going to do this. Any thoughts?
creator: sinyala

title: Secure Connection Failed to https://mybenefitwallet.com/ -- Linux only. No problem in Windows FF
content:
I am unable to access https://mybenefitwallet.com/ from Firefox 86.0.1 on Fedora Linux. Same Firefox in Windows works just fine. The error I get when accessing that site is:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to mybenefitwallet.com. Cannot communicate securely with peer: no common encryption algorithm(s).

Error code: SSL_ERROR_NO_CYPHER_OVERLAP
creator: mkg2

title: Firefox 86.0.1 has major problems with the newly intgrated Facebook & Instagram
content: Firefox has major problems logging into Instagram. Keep getting logged out and told to wait 24 hours to get back into my account. My account is 100% secure.
creator: NormG1
